name: Blackmarket Hustle
description:
You're a low-level dealer in illicit goods. Buy and sell your way to the top in this deckbuilding, strategy game. Grow your store and sales skills to obtain your throne.

How to Play

- Drag cards from your source to populate your store.

- Once ready, click the "Start Selling" button to begin the selling phase

- If all goes well, you'll make some money! Time to re-invest, buy better items, level up your rep and try to take over the city.

- Win the game by reaching a rep level of 10. Avoid getting too much heat and running out of money.
